name: Burger Invasion
description:
Defend the good health of our planet and shoot invading Burgers.

Buns and cheese are protecting their king Burger.
More shots are needed.

Take care of the enemy allies: Ketchup, Mustard, Soda and Fries.
They will try to stop you.
Avoid them and shoot Burgers.

Put apples, bananas, fresh water, carrots ...etc in your plate and you will be more powerful.
Every healthy choice will solve one of your problems:
Carrots will make you faster.
Fresh Water will help you destroy Soda.
Apples will double your power.
Real Tomatoes will help you destroy Sticky Ketchup.. and more!

99 levels of relaxing reflection shooting.
